messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Our son is going to be seen by an early intervent...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/10/2004 7:49:14 AM Eastern Daylight Time, macintyd@scott.disa.mil writes: I don t  know how much the therapy had to do with that, but I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/10/2004 7:49:14 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
macintyd@... writes:

I don't know how much the therapy
had to do with that, but I know it was not wholly due to it because he
had developed so much between his initial evaluation and his first
evaluation. <<<<

Right. It's hard to say about reading too. Teachers take a lot of credit for
teaching children to read, but most of that would have happened all on its
own in time.

Time is powerful stuff!

So's patience. <g>

~Kelly





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
